mapper.select: SELECT * FROM repboard WHERE board_title LIKE '%${word}%' OR board_writer LIKE '%${word}%' ORDER BY ${o}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repboard(board_no, parent_no, board_title, board_writer, board_dt, BOARD_PWD, board_cnt) VALUES(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{parent_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, SYSDATE, #{board_pwd}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE repboard SET board_cnt = board_cnt+1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
